about_the_game:
Forest God is a psychological horror game from the first person. The investigation of Agent X of the secret service turns into an endless journey deep into the universe, filled with abnormal incidents, the nature of which is previously unknown to anyone.

Agent X came to investigate abnormal incidents in the forest, but everything did not go according to plan, and now he cannot get out of the forest, left alone with the Wendigo — the spirit of the forest.

What kind of abnormal events are taking place in this forest? Does this pose a threat to the agent? Does Wendigo really exist? Who is a Wendigo? Is the whole reality of what is happening real or is it all Agent X's hallucinations?
The player will have to find answers to all these questions. But each player's answer will be unique, because there is no single version and everyone will understand the outcome of the game in their own way.

DEEP DIVE
The player will travel through a forest full of mysteries and through the subconscious of Agent X. It is unknown where reality ends and where delirium begins, so the player will dive as deep as possible.

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE
The player will travel through the forest and all its other incarnations. This forest has no beginning and no end.

A PUZZLE GAME
The player will decide individually for himself what is happening in this forest and everyone will understand this journey in their own way through the Easter eggs that the game is filled with.
